title: WishDeco Large Soup Bowls Set of 3, Ceramic Salad Bowls 1100ml / 37oz, White Pasta Bowl Ø 18cm / 7 inch, Serving Bowl for Noodle Ramen, Fruit, Dessert, Cereal
features: Deep Salad Bowls: With a generous capacity of 1100 mL/37 oz (Dimension: 18x7 cm; Weight: 0.56 kg/pc), the WishDeco salad bowl is perfect for enjoying your favorite salad, pasta, ramen, noodle, cereal, soup, dessert, popcorn and fruit
Durable Porcelain Material: Crafted from high-quality ceramic, our white bowls are chip-resistant, visually appealing, and built to last; The bowl set is non-toxic and harmless, lead and cadmium-free

Stylish and Practical: Simple and timeless design effortlessly complements any kitchen decor; With the elegant design, these salad bowls add a touch of elegance to any table setting; It is ideal for casual and formal dining, family dinners, restaurant serving, festival parties, food storage, and mixing baking materials

Convenient and Safe: Our white serving bowls are safe for microwave, oven, dishwasher and freezer, offering convenience and ease of use for heating and cleaning; The stackable design of these bowls makes storage a breeze, saving you valuable cabinet space
Well Packaged: Careful and solid package for the serving bowls during transportation to ensure safe delivery
